AccountNumber.description: The account number associated with the account

AccountId.description: The unique identifier for the account

TimePeriod.description: The time period covered in the report

CampaignId.description: The unique identifier for the campaign

AdGroupName.description: The name of the ad group

AdGroupId.description: The unique identifier for the ad group

Country.description: The country where the ad was displayed

State.description: The state where the ad was displayed

MetroArea.description: The metropolitan area where the ad was displayed

CurrencyCode.description: The currency code used in the report

AdDistribution.description: The distribution channel where the ad was shown

Impressions.description: The total number of ad impressions

Clicks.description: The total number of clicks on the ad

Spend.description: The total cost incurred for running the ad campaign

AveragePosition.description: The average position of the ad on the search results page

ProximityTargetLocation.description: The target location for proximity targeting

Language.description: The language targeted for the ad campaign

City.description: The city where the ad was displayed

QueryIntentDMA.description: The Designated Market Area from query intent

BidMatchType.description: The type of match that triggered the ad to show

DeliveredMatchType.description: The type of match that delivered the ad in the search results

Network.description: The advertising network where the ad was displayed

TopVsOther.description: Comparison of the top positions with other positions in displaying the ad

DeviceType.description: The type of device on which the ad was displayed (e.g., Desktop, Mobile)

DeviceOS.description: The operating system of the device on which the ad was displayed

Assists.description: The number of assists for conversions

Conversions.description: The total number of a specific type of conversions

ConversionRate.description: The conversion rate for a specific type of conversion

Revenue.description: The total revenue generated for a specific type of conversion

ReturnOnAdSpend.description: The return on ad spend for a specific type of conversion

CostPerConversion.description: The cost per conversion for a specific type of conversion

CostPerAssist.description: The cost per assist for conversions

RevenuePerConversion.description: The revenue generated per conversion for a specific type of conversion

RevenuePerAssist.description: The revenue generated per assist for conversions

County.description: The county where the ad was displayed

PostalCode.description: The postal code where the ad was displayed

QueryIntentPostalCode.description: The postal code from query intent

LocationId.description: The unique identifier for the location where the ad was displayed

QueryIntentLocationId.description: The unique identifier for the location from query intent

AllConversions.description: The total number of all types of conversions

AllRevenue.description: The total revenue generated for all types of conversions

AllConversionRate.description: The overall conversion rate for all types of conversions

AllCostPerConversion.description: The cost per conversion for all types of conversions

AllReturnOnAdSpend.description: The return on ad spend for all types of conversions

AllRevenuePerConversion.description: The revenue generated per conversion for all types of conversions

ViewThroughConversions.description: The number of conversions that occurred after a view-through of the ad

Goal.description: The goal associated with the ad performance

GoalType.description: The type of goal set for ad performance

AbsoluteTopImpressionRatePercent.description: The percentage of times the ad appeared in the top position on the first page of search results

TopImpressionRatePercent.description: The percentage of times the ad appeared in the top positions on the search results page

AverageCpm.description: The average cost per thousand impressions

ConversionsQualified.description: The number of qualified conversions for a specific type of conversions

AllConversionsQualified.description: The number of qualified conversions for all types of conversions

ViewThroughConversionsQualified.description: The number of qualified conversions that occurred after a view-through of the ad

Neighborhood.description: The neighborhood where the ad was displayed

ViewThroughRevenue.description: The revenue generated from conversions that occurred after a view-through of the ad

CampaignType.description: The type of campaign (e.g., Search, Display)

AssetGroupId.description: The unique identifier for the asset group

AssetGroupName.description: The name of the asset group
